attributes.action: appoint an agency, independent of parliament and civil service, to establish the full system of MPs' pay, benefits and allowances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The public has lost all confidence in MPs' ability to objectively and fairly set their own pay, benefits and allowances. Further, any agency beholden to parliament cannot be objective, which rules out a committee of government officials.

In order to establish a fair, transparent system which allows for clear and simple monitoring and enforcement, an outside, independent agency must be tasked to do this.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
